mapper.insert: insert into instructorInfo (iscrNo, mebrNo, intro, status, hourPmt) values (#{iscrNo}, #{mebrNo}, #{intro}, #{status}, #{hourPmt})
mapper.select: select i.iscrNo, m.id, m.name, concat(m.phone1, m.phone2, m.phone3) as phone, i.status, i.regDate from instructorInfo i join member m on i.mebrNo = m.mebrNo order by i.iscrNo asc limit #{offset}, #{pageSize};

select i.iscrNo, m.id, m.name, m.birth, concat(m.phone1, m.phone2, m.phone3) as phone, i.intro, i.status, i.hourPmt, m.acct, i.regDate, i.etc from instructorInfo i join member m on i.mebrNo = m.mebrNo where i.iscrNo = #{iscrNo};

select i.iscrNo, m.id, m.name, concat(m.phone1, m.phone2, m.phone3) as phone, i.status, i.regDate from instructorInfo i join member m on i.mebrNo = m.mebrNo WHERE true
AND m.name LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND m.id LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND i.status LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
order by i.iscrNo asc limit #{offset},#{pageSize};
